# Mikkel

```{r}
# Define the coordinates for the four corners of the square
x_coords <- c(0, 0, 1, 1)
y_coords <- c(0, 1, 0, 1)

# Create a blank plot
plot(x_coords, y_coords, xlim=c(-0.5, 1.5), ylim=c(-0.5, 1.5), type="n", xlab="", ylab="")

# Plot the square by drawing lines between the corners
polygon(x_coords, y_coords, border="blue", lwd=2)

# Add the text "dr.cc^2" in the middle of the square
text(0.5, 0.5, expression("dr.cc"^2), cex=2)

# Display the plot
grid()

```
